name: Piece by Piece (Medium Game Studio)
description:
Time. Music. History. Your mission: ensure key events take place to secure the future, piece by piece. 

3D point and click exploration 

  • WASD to move
  • left mouse click to interact
  • esc to quit game
  • Erica (ERlCA) 
    •  Lead Game Director / Level Design / Graphics
  • Jonathan (TheDW2)
    • Programming / Narrative Design
  • Lucas (rhythm07)
    • Music
